alert.note: Alert for Ceiba; Fajardo; Humacao; Naguabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 12 at 3:05PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Ceiba, Fajardo, Humacao and Naguabo, Puerto Rico. * WHEN...Until 315 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 204 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain has occurred, and additional rainfall is possible. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fajardo, Naguabo, Humacao, Ceiba, Punta Santiago, Aguas Claras, Anton Ruiz, Roosevelt Roads, Luis M. Cintron, Duque, Daguao, Rio Blanco, Bajandas, Pena Pobre, Candelero Arriba and Comunas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
